Package ohos.security.keystore

Class KeyStoreProtectionParameter.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.security.keystore.KeyStoreProtectionParameter.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    KeyStoreProtectionParameter

    public static class KeyStoreProtectionParameter.Builder
extends Object
    A static inner class of KeyGenAlgorithmParaSpec.

    This class provides methods used to set key parameters and finally create a KeyGenAlgorithmParaSpec object.

    Since:
    1

      Builder​(int secKeyUsagePurposes)
      A constructor used to create a KeyStoreProtectionParameter.Builder object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder​(int secKeyUsagePurposes)
        A constructor used to create a KeyStoreProtectionParameter.Builder object.
        Parameters:
        secKeyUsagePurposes - Indicates the purposes of using the key, which can be KeyStoreConstants#PURPOSE_CAN_ENCRYPT, KeyStoreConstants#PURPOSE_CAN_DECRYPT, KeyStoreConstants#PURPOSE_CAN_SIGN, or KeyStoreConstants#PURPOSE_CAN_VERIFY.
        Since:
        1

    • Method Detail

      • setSecKeyCryptoAttrs

        public KeyStoreProtectionParameter.Builder setSecKeyCryptoAttrs​(int type,
                                                                String... parameters)
        Sets the cryptographic attribute set of a key.

        A key-value set is used. The specific parameters depend on the value of type.

        Parameters:
        type - Indicates the parameter value ID, which can be KeyStoreConstants#CRYPTO_PARAMETER_DIGEST, KeyStoreConstants#CRYPTO_PARAMETER_ENCRYPT_PADDING, KeyStoreConstants#CRYPTO_PARAMETER_BLOCK_MODE, or KeyStoreConstants#CRYPTO_PARAMETER_SIGNATURE_PADDING.
        parameters - Indicates the parameter set.
        Returns:
        Returns the Builder object.
        Since:
        1

      • setSecKeyAccessibleAttr

        public KeyStoreProtectionParameter.Builder setSecKeyAccessibleAttr​(int secKeyAccessibleAttr)
        Sets the accessibility attribute set of a key.

        This method is used to set the key identifier used in a specific scenario.

        Parameters:
        secKeyAccessibleAttr - Indicates the accessibility attribute set, which can be KeyStoreConstants#FLAG_KEY_ACCESSIBLE_NEEDED_USER_AUTH, KeyStoreConstants#FLAG_KEY_ACCESSIBLE_NEED_DEVICE_UNLOCK, and KeyStoreConstants#FLAG_KEY_ACCESSIBLE_NEED_RANDOMIZED_ENCRYPTION.
        Returns:
        Returns the Builder object used to set the accessibility attribute set.
        Since:
        1

      • setSecKeyAuthDuration

        public KeyStoreProtectionParameter.Builder setSecKeyAuthDuration​(int secKeyAuthDuration)
        Sets the validity period for user authentication with a key, in seconds.
        Parameters:
        secKeyAuthDuration - Indicates the validity period for user authentication. By default, do not set it to -1.
        Returns:
        Returns the Builder object.
        Since:
        1

      • createCustomProtection

        public KeyStoreProtectionParameter createCustomProtection​()
        Creates a KeyStoreProtectionParameter object.
        Returns:
        Returns the created KeyStoreProtectionParameter object.
        Since:
        1
